mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT * FROM gallery_file ORDER BY file_no ASC) AS a GROUP BY NO ORDER BY NO DESC LIMIT #{page_cnt}, 20
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO gallery_file ( no, file_name, ufile_name ) VALUES ( #{bno}, #{file}, #{ufile} )
mapper.select: select * from gallery_file where no=#{bno} order by file_no asc
select count(*) from gallery_file where no=#{bno} and ( file_name like '%.jpg%' or file_name like '%.gif%' or file_name like '%.png%' or file_name like '%.jpeg%' )
